text: Campbell Scott (born July 19, 1961) is an American actor, producer and director. His roles include Steve Dunne in Singles, Mark Usher in House of Cards, Joseph Tobin in Damages, Richard Parker in The Amazing Spider-Man and The Amazing Spider-Man 2 and Lewis Dodgson in Jurassic World Dominion. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people
title: Campbell Scott
